drone_goals.description: Conduct mineral spectroscopy in rocky terrain near nodes N14 and N27.
Perform high-resolution aerial imaging of crater terrain at node N66.
Monitor atmospheric dust density in sandy terrain at node N18.

constraints: Drones are limited to short-duration missions and must return to their launch point after completing each survey.
All agents must avoid regions affected by environmental instability or hazardous conditions.
hazards: Node N60: severe dust storm activity
